channel.title: Wilderness problems
channel.description: when i die pknig in wilderness or when i die by npcs around my server i dont lose items how do i fix that

item.title: Wilderness problems

@johnboytnt wrote:

Then go back and try to decide or google around for codes

item.title: Wilderness problems
item.dc:creator: @pimpoutking pimpoutking
item.description:
@pimpoutking wrote:

[quote=“time of rune, post:4, topic:294829”][quote author=pimpoutking link=topic=389911.msg2911555#msg2911555 date=1250123680]
when i die pknig in wilderness or when i die by npcs around my server i dont lose items how do i fix that
[/quote]

You’ve probably made yourself Owner, or Admin, right? If so, it’s probably the previous server owner (the person who made the base) coded it so that a certain rank+ can’t lose items on death. Just make an account souly for PKing, works fine.[/quote]i made an normal account no staff and i still did not lose items

Read full topic

item.title: Wilderness problems
item.dc:creator: @time_of_rune time of rune
item.description:
@time_of_rune wrote:

pimpoutking:

when i die pknig in wilderness or when i die by npcs around my server i dont lose items how do i fix that

You’ve probably made yourself Owner, or Admin, right? If so, it’s probably the previous server owner (the person who made the base) coded it so that a certain rank+ can’t lose items on death. Just make an account souly for PKing, works fine.

Read full topic
